---
title: "EPSRC Centre for Doctoral Training in Collaborative Computational Modelling at the Interface (CCMI)"
---

This is the developing website for the CCMI CDT. 

CCMI is a collaboration between [University College London](https://ucl.ac.uk) and [Imperial College London](https://imperial.ac.uk), led by
the [UCL Advanced Research Computing Centre (ARC)](https://www.ucl.ac.uk/advanced-research-computing/advanced-research-computing-centre).

Please visit again soon to find out more about CCMI and its activities.
